import React from 'react'; import {Button,Modal, ModalBody,ModalHeader,Row,Label,Col,Form,FormGroup,Input } from 'reactstrap'; import { Control, LocalForm, Errors } from 'react-redux-form'; class CommentForm extends React.Component{ constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { isModalOpen: false }; this.toggleModal = this.toggleModal.bind(this); } toggleModal() { this.setState({ isModalOpen: !this.state.isModalOpen }); } handleSubmit(){ this.setState({ isModalOpen: false }); } render(){ return (
{/* Submit Comment */} Submit Comment this.handleSubmit()}>
) } } export default CommentForm
